name: Odlo Performance Light Crew Neck Long Sleeve Base Layer - Men's
categories: Performance Light Crew Neck Long Sleeve Basel
description: When hot and sweaty isn't an option. This lightweight performance long sleeve base layer has integrated ventilation throughout the arms and body to help keep you cool and move sweat away from your body. Plenty of stretch lets you reach and move freely.Made of moisture wicking polyester and nylon that breathes well and dries quickly.Elastane content stretches for unrestricted movement.Seamless mesh zones vent excess heat.Raglan sleeves allow full range of motion.
